backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control, storage mixins, and many domain types such as leads, services, projects, payments, and settings with corresponding in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables, color tokens, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with protected routes using AuthGate and RequireRole for pages across the app.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyS: Empty placeholder file for an admin‑only UI section.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClientServ: Empty placeholder file for a client service request admin panel.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that checks Internet Identity or demo mode and redirects unauthorized users to login.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form that collects and submits user profile details, with prefilled identifiers and Internet Identity requirement.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Component that gatekeeps pages based on user role and demo mode restrictions, showing access-denied UI when blocked.
frontend/src/components/common/BlockedSt: Card showing a blocked state message with optional navigation action.
frontend/src/components/common/ChartBloc: Card wrapper for chart sections with a title and optional action.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Card displaying an error message with optional retry button.
Card view of a lead with status, details, and a dialog trigger for full lead information.
frontend/src/components/common/ProgressB: Progress bar component showing percentage or value/max text.
frontend/src/components/common/SafeImage: Image that shows a loading placeholder and fallback initials on load failure.
frontend/src/components/common/ServiceNi: Renders 3D service or niche icons with SafeImage fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/common/StatsCard: Stat display card showing title, value, optional icon, subtitle, and trend.
frontend/src/components/deals/DealCard.t: Card representation of a deal showing status, value, and lead reference.
frontend/src/components/deals/DealDialog: Dialog form to create a new deal with value and status selection.
frontend/src/components/export/ExportDat: Provides UI and handlers to export fetched data into PDF-ready HTML, RTF, CSV, or Excel formats with download and toast feedback.
Defines the main app layout with mobile header, sidebar navigation, and responsive menu handling.
frontend/src/components/leads/AddLeadDia: Modal form for creating a new lead, validating fields, and submitting via useAddLead with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/leads/ImportLead: Dialog for uploading and parsing a CSV file into leads, importing them, and showing success or error results.
frontend/src/components/leads/LeadDetail: Displays lead details and allows updating the lead's status via useUpdateLeadStatus.
frontend/src/components/nav/FollowUpBadg: Shows a bell icon with optional badge for follow-ups due today, using a popover to list items (currently placeholder logic).
frontend/src/components/nav/SidebarNav.t: Sidebar navigation component that filters items by user role, displays app branding, and handles session clearing.
frontend/src/components/outreach/StartOu: Dialog for submitting a new outreach message, creating an OutreachActivity entry via mutation.
frontend/src/components/payments/Checkou: Checkout dialog that creates payment orders, selects payment methods, and shows instructions with auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays user payments with status badges, service lookup, and admin-only status update controls.
frontend/src/components/planner/PlannerP: Shows planner progress metrics and a list of daily tasks with streaks, completion, and highlighting for today.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Dialog for viewing and updating project details, including notes, progress, milestones, and attachments.
Form dialog for creating or editing projects, managing fields, validation, and submission via project hooks.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays detailed service information in a scrollable dialog, including pricing, deliverables, and metadata.
Form dialog for adding or editing services with support for list fields, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/uploads/Attachme: Renders a list of uploaded files with preview, download, and optional removal controls.
Handles file selection, validation, upload progress, and returns uploaded blobs to the parent.
frontend/src/constants/uploadedImages.ts: Static map of uploaded image asset URLs generated via publicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity, reinitializing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgencyAnalytics.ts: Provides a React Query hook to load leads, services, and projects for agency analytics, returning empty arrays for unimplemented backend fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRole.ts: Defines hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status using React Query with graceful handling of unauthorized users.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Implements hooks to create client service requests and fetch them by agency or globally, syncing cache invalidation on mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Contains hooks to get, save, and register the caller's user profile, integrating Internet Identity and React Query cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeals.ts: Implements placeholder deal-loading and mutation hooks with role checks and demo mode restrictions, without backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoSession.ts: Manages demo session state synced with backend, offering start and end controls with local persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportData.ts: Fetches leads, services, and projects for export, returning empty arrays for backend‑unsupported fields like deals and outreach.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities and managing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Implements lead queries and mutations with role checks, demo restrictions, and backend calls for fetching and modifying leads.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreach.ts: Defines hooks for fetching, creating, and updating outreach activities with role checks and demo-mode restrictions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Implements hooks for creating payments, retrieving payments, and updating payment status via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentSettings.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update payment settings, enforcing actor availability and admin-only updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanner.ts: Implements an in-memory planner with hooks to fetch, create, and update a 30‑day task plan.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Contains hooks to list, create, update, and complete projects with role validation and agency filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a hook to fetch the current user's role from the actor without retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Defines hooks to fetch, create, update, and seed services with admin‑only access checks and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionAppRole.ts: Manages the selected application role using session storage with helpers to update or clear it.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Exposes hooks to retrieve and update application settings, restricting updates to admins and non‑demo mode.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and custom utility classes for layout, typography, gradients, and interactive styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Fetches and visualizes agency analytics with key metrics and multiple Recharts charts, including revenue and niche breakdowns.
Placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays agency performance metrics, charts, and onboarding content using analytics and user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPage.tsx: Shows user deals grouped by status, supports creating new deals via a dialog, and handles loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Fetches paginated leads with search, filtering, and niche options, and provides UI for adding and browsing leads.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login via Internet Identity or demo mode with role selection, validation, and redirect logic.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Displays outreach activities grouped by platform with tabs and allows starting new outreach via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PlannerPage.tsx: Shows the 30‑day outreach plan, lets users create a new plan, and displays plan details if available.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists projects with status, progress, and related client/service info, and provides dialogs for creating and viewing project details.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalSharePage.tsx: Renders a simple proposal viewer placeholder using a proposalId from the URL.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Manages services with search, activation toggles, dialogs for editing/details/checkout, and optional catalog seeding.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPricingPage.t: Presents predefined service pricing sections with offerings and opens a checkout dialog for purchases.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: User settings page that loads and edits profile and payment settings with tabs and save handlers.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign‑in page allowing optional identifier entry before Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/UnauthorizedPage.tsx: Displays an access‑denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/types/docx.d.ts: Type declarations for the docx library including document, table, and formatting classes.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Type definitions for jspdf-autotable covering table cells, styles, and options.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Type declarations for jsPDF including constructor options, text APIs, and output methods.
frontend/src/types/local.ts: Local interfaces for Deal and OutreachActivity domain objects.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Type declarations for xlsx including workbook, worksheet, utils, and file operations.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Empty placeholder file for admin allowlist logic.
frontend/src/utils/assets/publicAssetUrl: Builds base‑path‑aware URLs for public assets using the runtime base URL.
frontend/src/utils/export/download.ts: Utility to trigger downloading a Blob by creating and clicking a temporary link.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportCsv.ts: Generates CSV export sections for various data types with field formatting and escaping.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportDocx.ts: Creates an RTF‑based DOCX‑compatible export with sections rendered as simple tables.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportPdf.ts: Generates printable HTML-based PDFs by assembling styled tables for each export data section.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportSchema.t: Defines field schemas and formatting helpers for leads, outreach, services, deals, and projects used in exports.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportXlsx.ts: Builds simple SpreadsheetML XML to produce XLSX-compatible exports without external libraries.
frontend/src/utils/export/filename.ts: Generates timestamped export filenames and readable formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/icons/serviceNiche3dI: Maps service types and niches to corresponding 3D icon asset URLs.
frontend/src/utils/leads/csv.ts: Parses CSV text into Lead objects with validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/rbac.ts: Defines role-based route permissions and helpers for checking access and navigation visibility.
Provides a predefined catalog of service offerings with pricing and delivery details.
frontend/src/utils/services/serviceDetai: Utility functions for parsing, joining, and validating list-like service detail fields.
frontend/src/utils/sessionAuth.ts: Manages session-based role and demo flags via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/signInIdentifier.ts: Provides sessionStorage helpers and logic to classify, prefill, and compare email or phone sign‑in identifiers.
frontend/src/utils/uploads/fileValidatio: Validates uploaded files by size, extension, and MIME type, returning structured success or error results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of project state, including scope updates, architecture notes, issues, and required images.
